channel.title: .nub project
channel.description:
This is a little idea I had... Instead of me making a server and being a noob about it, I am simply going to make a website. Server status page aswell.
There are forums for whatever. :P Anyway I need to test the server status page I made, anyone interested in this add your server name. [hr] And another part, tutorials. I was thinking of users who have submitted tutorials to let me add them to a page in which you can select what type of tutorial or by the author. [hr] file hosting, my computer isn't ALWAYS on, however, I am making a file uploading system, one which you can upload things for download. [hr]
Anyone interested in this let me know.
